root.name: Zettai Zetsumei Toshi 4: Summer Memories
root.description: Overview Zettai Zetsumei Toshi 4: Summer Memories was an Irem title in development for the PlayStation 3.Â The fourth title in a series based around survival in the face of severe natural disasters, it was canceled after an 8.9 earthquake and a tsunami hit Japan in March of 2011.
